trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of key that is associated with a security token.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelen som er knyttet til en sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityKeyType enumeration to set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SecurityKeyType opplistingen til å angi den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenRequirement.KeyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BearerKey field is used with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement.KeyType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Feltet BearerKey brukes med den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement.KeyType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenParametersElement.KeyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: BearerKey Requires Wsu:Id or Transport Security with Message Credentials In federation scenarios, an issued token is generally configured as an endorsing supporting token for message security between a client and the relying parties.
trans-unit.target: Et utstedt token vanligvis er konfigurert som en token som støtter godkjenning for sikkerhet for melding mellom en klient og beroende parter BearerKey krever Wsu:Id eller Transport Security med meldingen legitimasjonen i federation scenarier.

trans-unit.source: However, when a Security Token Service (STS) issues a token with no key (BearerKey), [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] configures it as a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode> supporting token ([!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cannot endorse without a key).
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid når en sikkerhet Token Service (STS) problemer et token med ingen nøkkel (BearerKey) [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] konfigurerer den som en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode>støttet token ([!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] kan støtte uten en key).</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityTokenAttachmentMode>

trans-unit.source: This requires the issued token to be referenced in the signature.
trans-unit.target: Dette krever utstedt token for referanse i signaturen.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] currently uses the following: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id as a reference mechanism (Wsu:Id).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]for øyeblikket bruker du følgende: http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id som en referanse mekanisme (Wsu:Id).

trans-unit.source: If an issued token does not have such an attribute, on a client, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException> is thrown with the text "Element to sign must have id".
trans-unit.target: Hvis et utstedt token ikke har en attributten, på en klient en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException>er et med teksten "Elementet til å signere må ha-id".</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageSecurityException>

trans-unit.source: This happens when a SAML 1.1 token is used as an issued token (the Wsu:Id is not defined in the SAML 1.1 specification).
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer når en SAML 1.1 token brukes som et utstedt token (Wsu:Id ikke er definert i SAML 1.1-spesifikasjonen).

trans-unit.source: To work around this situation, either use transport security with message credentials (for example, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>) or an STS must add the http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id (Wsu:Id) to the issued token.
trans-unit.target: Du kan løse dette problemet ved enten bruke transportsikkerhet med legitimasjonen for melding (for eksempel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>) eller en STS må legge til http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd:Id (Wsu:Id) utstedt token.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: Note that if the Wsu:Id is added to a SAML 1.1 token, the resulting XML does not comply to the SAML 1.1 specification.
trans-unit.target: Merk at hvis Wsu:Id er lagt til et SAML 1.1-token, resulterende XMLEN ikke samsvarer SAML 1.1-spesifikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The alternative is to add a Wsu:Id to the `EncryptedData` which is a result of encrypting the issued token.
trans-unit.target: Alternativet er å legge til en Wsu:Id til den `EncryptedData` som er et resultat av kryptering utstedt token.

trans-unit.source: This procedure complies with the SAML 1.1 specification, because the `EncryptedData` element supports the Wsu:Id attribute.
trans-unit.target: Denne prosedyren er i samsvar med SAML 1.1-spesifikasjonen fordi den `EncryptedData` elementet støtter Wsu:Id-attributtet.

trans-unit.source: So to be compliant with the specification, the bearer token must be encrypted by the STS.
trans-unit.target: Så for å være kompatibel med spesifikasjonen, må bæremodus-token være kryptert av STS.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the key is an asymmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelen er en asymmetrisk nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the security token does not contain a proof-of-possession key.
trans-unit.target: Angir sikkerhetstokenet ikke inneholder en bevis besittelse nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the key is a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: Angir nøkkelen er en symmetrisk nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
